All Implemented Interfaces:
IManager
public class GroupManager
extends DeletableListedCollectionManager<java.lang.String,SingleGroupManager>

Should do all communication involving groups on the server. Caches results to make everything behave pleasantly.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class GroupManager.GroupSummaryRequest
          Helper class to send requests to get group info (this will send a batch request to the server, and retrieve a summary of all group names and sizes).
